# ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.geoTracking

**Case**

A goal that specifies your app requires a precise geographic location.

## Declaration

```swift
case geoTracking
```

## Discussion

When you set this goal, the coaching overlay provides the user instructions when they start a geotracking session, or when they go off course during a session.

## Defining a Goal

- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.anyPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a plane of any type.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.horizontalPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a horizontal plane.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.tracking**: A goal that specifies your app requires basic world tracking.
- **ARCoachingOverlayView.Goal.verticalPlane**: A goal that specifies your app requires a vertical plane.
